desc: Greatly increases drop rate of BC and HC when attacking

dictionary.lore: A mysterious device that seems to have come to life through whispers alone. It stirs up the fighting spirit of the wearer on the battlefield, while increasing the restorative powers of the body as well. There is only one other item known to resemble this one in name. The reason why the creator of this stone was not mentioned even once in the records the owner left behind is speculated to have been in order to protect this valuable item from being stolen.

name: Virtue Stone
